BT.modules.ObjectedOrientedPetriNet.places

Class PetriNetModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.models.CoordinateModel
      • BT.modules.ObjectedOrientedPetriNet.places.PetriNetModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PNPlaceModel, PNTransitionModel

    public class PetriNetModel
extends CoordinateModel
    Model for managing petriNet models. It stores variables in MyArrayList as unique Strings.
    Author:
    Karel Hala
